attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 2012 Olympic logo is neither attractive, nor at a cost of £400,000 is it value for money.

The "jagged 2012" should be rejected and replaced by the designers AT NO ADDITIONAL COST as the product is not fit for purpose.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
